attributes.action: Tell People To Stop Persecuting Cyclists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cyclists are always blamed for everything. I ride on the ROAD and a pedestrian steps in front of me. I slam my brakes on and they blame me with a mouthful of abuse, motorists are just as bad. I ride on a cycle path and pedestrians shout 'get on the road'. We can just never win, it is about time someone took our side and stopped arrogant pedestrians/motorists abusing us
